publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

monogr.title: A treatise of the preparation to the holy supper of our onely saueour and redeemer, Iesus Christe : Necessary for all them that vvil vvorthely approche to the Lords holy table. Also a dialogue containing the principall points, whiche they that wil receiue the Supper ought to knowe and vnderstand. By Yues Rouspeau minister of the vvord of God. Ttanslated [sic] out of French into English by R.B
monogr.author: Rouspeau, Yves

div.head: The Preface.
div.p: ¶ To come worthely to the holy Supper of our Lord Iesus Christe / 1. Cor. 11.28. we must examine our selues according too the admonition of the Apostle Saint Paule. Now the examination of our selues consisteth cheefely in foure poynts / that is to say / in Faith / repentance / giuing of thanks to God / and looue towards our neighbours.
